title: Product website
context: This is an educational project carried out as part of my studies at HETIC. The subject was to create a digital project related to the Human in society. With my team (composed of 6 people), we created an application that generates accessible journeys for people with disabilities. The challenge was to set up these people in order to develop an application that could be used on a daily basis.
